meanings.definition: Add notes or comments to a text or diagram for explanation or interpretation.
meanings.sent1: I will annotate the book with important notes.
meanings.sent2: Teachers often annotate students' essays with feedback.
meanings.sent3: I decided to annotate my grocery list with doodles.
meanings.sent4: She likes to annotate her calendar with colorful stickers.
meanings.sent5: He will annotate the map with detailed directions.

meanings.definition: Provide explanatory notes or critical commentary on a text.
meanings.sent1: The professor will annotate the article for the class.
meanings.sent2: Writers often annotate their own work before publishing.
meanings.sent3: I like to annotate my favorite book with funny comments.
meanings.sent4: She will annotate the report with insightful remarks.
meanings.sent5: He decided to annotate the document with additional information.
